title: Riot support is fucking terrible
body: They have the worst customer support of and game/service/good i have ever bought. Comcast mocks them for their ability to satisfy upset customers. I have had 2 accounts hacked because riot will gladly charge me 5 dollars for a champ but not use proper protection of their servers. A humongous company that has no phone support, no live chat, and you have to wait days to get a fucking email response. The only problem with this game is the incompetent morons running it. Fuck you riot seriously fuck you. I want my hundreds of dollars and fucking time back you useless shitheads. Thanks have a nice day.

replies.body:
Hey convolvuluses5!

If you had an account stolen from you, we want to help recover it as quickly as possible!  I went ahead and searched for any tickets you might have had open, but I was only able to find one ticket from 2013.  In this ticket, we responded to you within 24 hours asking for some information regarding the account that got hacked, but you never responded with any information :(

If you had an account stolen, make sure to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) once more and include as much information regarding the account as you can.  We may ask some fairly in-depth information, but this is to ensure that we are recovering the account back to the original owner.

Additionally, remember to [verify your email](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751744-Email-Verification-FAQ) with your League of Legends account!  This way, even if a player is able to somehow gain access on your account, you can easily request a password reset and change the password!

Here is some other helpful information as well:  https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account
I know it's your job to, but to actually respond to someone like this still deserves praise.

I have had both ok, and absolutely awful experiences with Riot Support. At their best, they give you a copy pasted answer that answers your question. At their worst, they give you copy pasted answers that completely don't answer your question at all as a result of them misreading it or not caring enough to look into it.
